description: It's midnight and the burly nurse Dak Ramsey stands guard alone in the psych ward. Making his rounds, Dak finds CJ the sex addict tied up in his cell. CJ is wiggling his cock and begging for Dak's cock. Our burly nurse decides to take it upon himself to cure CJ of his ailment. Dak uses electricity on CJ's cock, but that just made him even hornier. Dak tries to beat the devil out of him with a flogger but he has no luck. In the end, both get really horny and fuck until the sun comes up.
title: The Sex Addict
